sys_hub_flow.name: Sch meetup <21 days

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Meetup event Record➛Group➛Organizer➛First name,

I saw that you have an upcoming Meetup scheduled for Trigger➛Meetup event Record➛Event time, which is very exciting! Can you please add a finalized agenda to your Meetup.com event page? This will help spark interest within your developer community.

Please let me know if you need anything else from my end before your event.

Thank you for your efforts as an organizer!

Best,
